snippet: A 46-year-old man died, apparently of a heart attack, in the waters of the San Francisco Bay after the start of the Escape From Alcatraz Triathlon, race officials said.
lead_paragraph: A 46-year-old man died, apparently of a heart attack, in the waters of the San Francisco Bay after the start of the Escape From Alcatraz Triathlon, race officials said.

headline.seo: Man Dies After Start of Escape From Alcatraz Triathlon
headline.main: Man Dies Just After Start of Triathlon
